To know that my brother will come to me...

enemies of our state are never empty-handed." It didn't stop.

fine, brother, I'm fine. Don't worry.

english: Ertuğrul Bey, please speak. Tell me .
Halime, be strong in the face of what I'm about to say .

text: Noyan, Dündar ve Yiğit Alp’i kaçırdı.
english: Noyan kidnapped Dündar and Yiğit Alp.
I have come to see His Highness the Emir.

text: Emir Hazretleri, Tüccar Abdullah sizi görmek ister.
english: His Highness the Emir, Merchant Abdullah wants to see you. He wants it.

text: O iki çocuğu eline geçirdin demek?
english: So you got your hands on those two children?
But looking Ertuğrul straight in the eyes…
…I sent both children to my cave.

text: Ertuğrul’un avradının suratına bakacak hâli kalmamıştır.
english: Ertuğrul's wife can't even look him in the face anymore .
What will you do with Dündar?
I want Dündar from you, Noyan.

text: Beyim, Halime Sultan iyidir. Lakin doğum başlamıştır.
english: My lord, Halime Sultan is well. But labor has begun.
You must inform the midwife immediately.

text: Selcan Hatun, sen de sıcak su hazırlayasın. Ebe hatun geldiğinde ihtiyaç olacaktır.
english: Selcan Hatun, you prepare hot water. It will be needed when the midwife arrives.
I will prepare it quickly, my lord.

text: Daha vakit vardı Artuk Bey. Lakin sen evladım için erken doğar dersin.
english: was still time, Artuk. "My lord. But you say my child will be born prematurely. Has something happened
My lord, keep your heart at ease. Thank God,

text: Evladına hiçbir zeval gelmemiştir çok şükür.
english: nothing has happened to your child .
Halime Sultan's grief has triggered the birth.
God willing, your child will be born healthy.

text: O Noyan iti, kardeşlerime ilişmenin bedelini ödeyecek.
english: That Noyan dog will pay the price for harming my brothers.
(Sound of breathing heavily through his nose)
How is Halime Sultan, brother? The
Halime's excitement has accelerated the birth. Is

text: Tüm bunların sebebi Noyan’ın ettikleri midir?
english: all this because of Noyan's actions?

text: Ertuğrul, de hele kardeş, nasıl oldu bu iş?
english: Ertuğrul, tell me, brother, how did this happen? Noyan knew that

text: Dündar ve Yiğit’in obaya döneceğinden haberi vardı Noyan’ın.
english: Dündar and Yiğit would return to the tribe .
What do you think, Ertuğrul Bey?
From whom did he get the information? I don't know
But it's clear that he received support from someone.
I will find both of them.
My Sungur Tekin Bey. Your composure..." Protect them. Let

english: 's not act impulsively. We need to take a breath and think. What is there to think about, Tugtekin Bey, while

text: Kardeşim o itin ellerindeyken düşünecek ne var Tuğtekin Bey?
english: my brother is in the hands of that dog ? We
have to go and find them.
If he wanted to kill them… he would have taken

text: Bu kadar rahat nasıl dersin bunu Ertuğrul?
english: How can you say this so easily, Ertugrul?

text: Fırsatı varken neden yapmadı o zaman ağabey?
english: Why didn't he do it then, brother, when he had the chance?
There's a game within a game.

text: Dua edelim ki dediğin gibi olsun Ertuğrul.
english: Let's pray that it's as you say, Ertugrul. Don't you know

text: Sen benim buraya neden geldiğimi bilmez misin Saadettin?

english: How can you ask me for Dündar? I

text: Senin için şehzadeyi aldım. Dündar benimdir.
english: took the prince for you. Dündar is mine.

text: Bu gece ölecek. Ceset de obaya gidecek.
english: He will die tonight. The body will go to the tribe.

text: Dündar’ın ölüsü yalnızca bir mezar doldurur.
english: Dündar's dead body will only fill one grave.
But his life is more valuable. It will
open many new graves for you.

text: Lanet olsun mezarlarına. Neyin peşindesin Saadettin?
english: Damn their graves. What are you after, Saadettin?

text: İki oba da hâkimiyetim altına girmeli.

text: Bana güvenmeleri için Dündar’ı bana ver Noyan.

tired of you and your games.

text: İntikam almayı istiyorsan, sabretmeyi öğreneceksin Noyan.
english: If you want revenge, you'll learn to be patient, Noyan.

text: Hem ben olmayaydım, o iki çocuktan haberin dahi olmayacaktı.
english: Besides, if it weren't for me, you wouldn't even know about those two children.
Like a fox watching the chicken coop… you would have been licking the
as I gave you the children…
I will open the door of your chicken coop wide open.

text: Bir süredir Noyan’ın inini arardı. İz sürüp bulacaksınız o iti.
english: He has been searching for Noyan's lair for some time. You will track down that dog. Your wish is my command, my lord

text: Ağabey, biz de Alpleri alıp ormanlık, kayalık demeden her yeri alt üst edeceğiz.
english: Brother, we will take the Alps and search everywhere, regardless of whether it's forest or rocky.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, sen Halime Sultan’ın yanında kal. Biz gereğini yaparız.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, you stay with Halime Sultan. We will do what is necessary.

text: Sungur Tekin Bey, bütün Alpleri aramaya tahsis et.
english: Sungur Tekin Bey, assign all the Alps to the search.

text: Halime Sultan bundan gayrı ebe hatunlara emanettir beyim.
english: Halime Sultan is now entrusted to the midwives, my lord.
When will Artuk Bey be born?

text: Orası belli olmaz beyim. Sabahı da bulabilir.
english: That's uncertain, my lord. It could be morning.

text: Dündar kümesin kapısını açmak için elimizde kalan son anahtardır.
english: Dündar is the last key we have to open the henhouse door. Do you
Give him to me so the henhouse will be yours.

text: Sultan Alaeddin’e düşman üç Türkmen Bey’i var.
english: There are three Turkmen Beys who are enemies of Sultan Alaeddin.
They want to come and see the prince tomorrow.

text: Sen şehzadeyi sultan olmaya ikna et.
english: You convince the prince to become sultan.

text: Et ki önümüzdeki bütün kapılar ardına kadar açılsın.
english: Do that so all the doors before us will open wide.

take what I want and leave. I have no

text: Allah’ın izniyle onun için elimden geleni yapacağım.

Now I've come to take you. Do

I want to see you by my side, woman. Do

text: Kader bizi intikamla bir araya getirdi.

I don't believe in fate, Goncagül. Lady.

text: Ben sadece içimdeki çölün uğultusunu dinlerim.

What does the desert within you desire, Noyan?
You will see when you come with me.
Alps, Noyan might ambush us. To avoid an

Ebe hatun, bebem gelir herhalde. Hissederim.

(Midwife) God willing. There's still some time.
What are we going to do?
Let's take you like this. Come. Come.
What's the situation, Selcan Hatun? Our

The midwives of both tribes are in charge. You can rest assured

english: Ertuğrul Because my lord knew Noyan would return…
…he ordered me to find his cave . I’ve been
tracking him for a long time.

could be Noyan’s soldiers. They could

…she won't even be able to rejoice for her unborn child .

Now she waits for me. We have to
get out of here, Yiğit Alp.

Take a deep breath. Take a deep

(Midwife) Deep, deep. Take a deep breath.
have emerged from so many calamities.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Ayrılık acısı yaşatmasın Halime Sultan.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) May Halime Sultan not suffer the pain of separation.

text: (Halime dış ses) Çoluğumuzla, çocuğumuzla uzun bir ömür nasip etsin.
english: (Halime's voiceover) May God grant us a long life with our family and children.

text: (Halime dış ses) Kayılar ve Kınık bu çadırda bir vücut oldu.
english: (Halime's voiceover) The Kayı and Kınık tribes have become one body in this tent.

text: (Halime dış ses) İki boyu bir ettik Ertuğrul Bey'im.
english: (Halime's voiceover) We have united two tribes, Ertuğrul Bey.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Boylar bir ola, soyumuz kutlu ola Halime Sultan.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) May our tribes be united, may our lineage be blessed, Halime Sultan.
(Soldier) The prisoner is escaping. Catch him.
(Soldier) Otherwise, Noyan will skin us alive.
(Sound of a dagger being plunged in) - Ah.

text: Sungur Tekin Bey'im, Emir Saadettin Köpek...
english: Mr. Sungur Tekin, Emir Saadettin Köpek...
...is waiting for you at the caravanserai.
But he said it was important.
Alps. You return to the camp. Let them

text: Yerinize başka Alpler aramaya devam etsin.
english: continue looking for other Alps to replace you. Yes sir
You are in the safe hands of the Seljuk State.
What was your business with the Mongols?

text: Ben Kayı Obası'ndan Süleyman Şah oğlu Dündar Bey.
english: I am Dündar Bey, son of Süleyman Şah, from the Kayı tribe.
Noyan's soldiers were taking me to be killed.
I was rescued thanks to your soldiers.
So you are the son of Suleiman Shah? I have always appreciated what

text: Babanın devletimiz için yaptıklarını her zaman takdir ettim.
english: your father did for our country .
I am Saadettin Köpek, the emir of Sultan Alaeddin Keykubad
I will send word to Obana.
They need to know that it's okay.
Noyan is waiting for you. -Let's go.
What are we going to do, Turgut Alp?
They are going to Noyan's place.
We'll go to Geyikli too. Come on

text: Türkmen beyleri size biat etmek için geldiler.
english: Turkmen chieftains have come to pledge allegiance to you.
They ask permission to kiss your hand. They are welcome to come

text: Sultanım, bundan gayrı yeni sultanımız sizi bilir, size itaat ederiz.
english: My Sultan, from now on we will recognize you as our new Sultan and we will obey you.

text: Sultanım, ben ve obam size itaat ederiz.
english: My Sultan, I and my tribe obey you. It has

text: Obalarımızda huzur yüzü görmek haram oldu.
english: become forbidden for us to see peace in our villages.
The state needs a new leader.

text: Biz de size itaat ederiz sultanım.

english: I accept your obedience to me.

text: (Yiğit) Bilesiniz ki sultanınız olarak size gereken desteği vereceğim.
english: (Yiğit) Know that as your sultan, I will give you the support you need.
Your villages will experience peace and justice.
His Highness the Emir has ordered you to wait here.
(Music) My heart is always filled with deep sorrow whenever I remember how the

text: ...her daim içim derin bir üzüntüyle dolar.
Kardeşler her daim omuz omuza olmalı.
english: Siblings should always stand shoulder to shoulder.
God, oh God, thank you so much.
How did you escape from Noyan?

text: Askerlerim birkaçını derdest edip kurtarmışlar Dündar Bey'i.
english: My soldiers managed to apprehend a few of them and rescue Mr. Dündar.
Noyan's soldiers were going to kill me. If it weren't for

text: Emir Hazretleri'nin askerleri olmasaydı şimdiye ölmüştüm ağabey.
english: the soldiers of His Highness the Emir, I would be dead by now, brother. What about
Yiğit? Where is Yiğit? My older
brother stayed in Yiğit Noyan's cave.
If I knew where he was... I would have

text: ...şimdiye kadar çoktan gidip işini bitirirdim Noyan'ın.
english: gone and finished Noyan off by now.
(Turgut) If you're going to kill me, then kill me.
(Sound of whip) Do not fear, my prince
These things won't happen to you.
What do you want from him?

text: Sizleri ne kadar çok insan severse, işimiz o kadar kolay olur.
english: people who like you, the easier our job becomes.
Geyikli, go to the village immediately.

text: Kış herkes için çetindi bu yıl.
english: Winter was tough for everyone this year.
Now is the time for rejuvenation.

text: Türkmen obalarının beyleri bir bir kapımı çalarlar göç için.
english: chieftains of the Turkmen tribes knock on my door one by one, begging for migration. No
one else has arrived yet. They
do you discuss this matter with me and not with the chieftains of our tribes?

text: Devletimizin göç meselesi üzerinde ne kadar hassas olduğunu...
...senden daha iyi kim bilir Sungur Tekin Bey'im?
english: Who knows better than you, Mr. Sungur Tekin, how sensitive our state is to the issue of migration?
They'll knock on my door sooner or later. You're not going to stay

text: İlelebet Pasinler Ovası'nda kalacak haliniz yok ya.
english: in the Pasinler Plain forever, are you?
For your flocks, for your trade... I
would like you to migrate to the most distinguished places. When you

text: Obana döndüğünde beylere bu samimi hislerimi söylersin.
english: return to Obana, tell the gentlemen about these sincere feelings of mine. It's

text: Belli ki bir yere çoktan karar vermişsiniz Emir Hazretleri.
english: clear you've already made up your mind, Your Highness. I

text: Aklımda birçok yer vardı, lakin en münasibi...
english: had many places in mind, but
I think Ahlat would be the most suitable.

text: Obanın beyleri de Ahlat yakınlarına göç etmek ister.
english: tribal chiefs also want to migrate to a place near Ahlat.

text: Hoş Ertuğrul bana hain bile der.
english: Even Ertuğrul calls me a traitor.
But I call him my brother.

text: Devleti onun yanında olanları nasıl baş tacı ettiğini...

english: Hopefully everyone will see how the state treats those who are on its side with the utmost respect. Please give my regards to

text: Hayme Hatun ve Gündoğdu Bey'e de...
english: Hayme Hatun and Gündoğdu Bey as well

text: Ya başka yere göç etmek isteyen olursa?
Böyle bir bölücülüğü kim yapar Sungur Tekin Bey'im?
english: Who would engage in such divisive behavior, Mr. Sungur Tekin?

text: Hem böyle bir şey yapacak olurlarsa...
english: And if they were to do something like that...
I would expect you to say no first.
Let's say someone wanted to incite separatism?

text: Burada devlet benim Sungur Tekin Bey'im.
english: Here, the state is me, Mr. Sungur Tekin.
The state showed its compassionate face today.
should dare to see the ruthless face of the state.
to Sultan Alaeddin (Saadettin) . I recounted everything

text: Ertuğrul'un Gümüştekin Bey'e yaptıklarını bir bir anlattım.
english: Ertuğrul had done to Gümüştekin Bey, one by one .
Now I await a response from him.

text: Benim kabulüm olmadan uç beyimin cezasını kesen...
english: Whoever punishes my commander without my consent...
would like to discuss the prince with Halime Sultan.
...the most important event that would endanger the survival of the state...

text: ...Allah muhafaza hepimiz bu işin altında kalırız.
english: God forbid, we'll all suffer the consequences .

text: (Saadettin) Şimdi gidin. Ben de arkanızdan obaya geleceğim.
english: (Saadettin) Now go. I will follow you to the camp. May

text: Allah sizden razı olsun Emir Hazretleri.
english: God be pleased with you, Your Highness.
I will never forget this kindness you have shown me.
Have a safe journey, Dündar. Meeting

text: Senin gibi yiğit bir delikanlıyla tanışmak...
english: a brave young man like you...
always be grateful to you, Emir Saadettin, for giving my brother back to us.
Our government will always be by your side.
You should know this as well.

text: Mağaranın yanında yakaladık bu Alp'i Noyan.
english: We caught this Alpine man, Noyan, near the cave.

text: Bakıyorum da iki yılan birbirinizi bulmuşsunuz.
english: It seems like you two snakes have found each other.
(Sound of a punch) -Ah. Does anyone know he
you will fall into the hands of Ertuğrul Bey.
be the day you die with that woman...
You've found the location of the cave.
I bear witness that there is no god but Allah...

text: ...ve eşhedü enne Muhammeden abdûhü ve resûlühu.
english: ...and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.
(Music) You will pay the price for not

text: Devletin kanunlarına boyun eğmemenin bedelini ödeyeceksin Ertuğrul.
english: obeying the laws of the state, Ertuğrul.
Here you will learn who the state is.

text: (Kadın) Korkmayasın. Hadi hadi Halime Sultan, ha gayret.
english: (Woman) Don't be afraid. Come on, Halime Sultan, keep going!
(Selcan) There's nothing to be afraid of.
(Selcan) You will hold your child in your arms.
Ah. Keep up the good work! Keep
Your son is being stubborn, Halime Sultan.

text: Lakin korkmayasın, babası gibi kudret sahibi olacak.
english: But do not fear, he will be as powerful as his father.

text: Boyunu boylayacak, soyunu soylayacak bir evladın oldu Ertuğrul Bey'im.
english: Ertuğrul Bey, you now have a son who will live up to your stature and continue your lineage.
Thank you, Gökçe Hatun. May I
God raise him with his parents.
hope my son grows up healthy and well.
your tent be filled with joy, God willing. May it bring you more height and

text: Kadir Mevla'm sizi her daim mesut etsin.
english: God Almighty always keep you happy. May
God never take you away from us. Thank you
My dear Ertuğrul Bey. We had

text: Güzeller güzeli aslan gibi bir oğlumuz oldu.
Çok şükür Allah'a ikinizi de bana bağışladı Halime Sultan.
english: Thank God, He has blessed me with both of you, Halime Sultan.

text: Otağımız en son Dündar'ın sesiyle şen olmuştu beyim.
english: Our tent was last enlivened by Dündar's voice, my lord. We were

text: Hayli vakit sonra bir kez daha şen olduk.
english: happy once again after a long time.
My Lord, in these days of sorrow...

text: ...bize böyle umut veren bir hediyeyle obamızı şenlendirdi.
english: ... you have brightened our village with such a hopeful gift. May
your neck be taller, may your lineage be nobler. May
God grant your child a long life. Thanks,
so much, God. May God grant
my son a long life and

text: Ona amcasıyla, dayısıyla birlikte büyümeyi nasip eyle.
english: him the blessing of growing up with his uncle and maternal uncle.

text: Rabbim bana evladımı bağışladığı gibi kardeşimi de bağışlayacak.
english: God has spared my son, He will also spare my brother.
(Suleyman Shah's voiceover) If you have sons...

text: ...Moğollarla savaşırken benim için hayatını veren Savcı Alp'in...
english: ...name them after Savci Alp, who gave his life for me while fighting the Mongols ...
...after Gündüz Alp, who fell as a martyr in my arms...

text: ...rahmetli şehit dayım Osman Alp'in adlarını veresiniz.
english: ...after my late martyr uncle Osman Alp. I have always wished for the names of

text: Soyumuzda bu mübarek yiğitlerin adlarının yaşamasını...
english: these blessed heroes to live on in our lineage. If

text: Allah nasip eder de oğullarımız olursa...

english: ...may the names of these blessed Alps bring honor to our lineage...
...strength to our tribe, and peace to our family. May
God bless you all with happiness.
I bear witness that there is no god but Allah.

text: Otağımıza döndüğüm için mutlu bile olamıyorum.
english: n't even be happy to be back at our tent.
Brother, what are we going to say to Halime Sultan?
You gave him his name... May
God grant him a long life, sir.
Gündüz will become a brave and valiant warrior like you...

text: ...senin gibi cevval bir Alp olur inşallah.

english: Thank you, Mr. Tuğtekin. May your

text: Adı gibi aydınlık ömrü olsun beyim.
english: life be as bright as your name, sir.

text: İnşallah sizin evladınızın sesi de tez vakitte otağınızı doldursun.
english: Hopefully, your child's voice will soon fill your home.
You have blessed me with both my son Gündüz and my brother Dündar.
How did you escape from Noyan's clutches?
